provide clues to further ensure the existence of Ti III , indicating the conversion of Ti IV to Ti III in the photoreduction system.It is noteworthy that NM 111 exhibits excellent stability after five cycles, and the photoreduction activity was maintained above 85 compared with the initial test (Figure S12).The PXRD pattern (Figure S13), FT-IR spectra (Figure S14), and SEM image (Figure S15) of NM 111 after five recycles confirm the structure stability under the photocatalytic reaction conditions.
